channel.title: HIV Management on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in HIV Management on FinanClub

item.title: IBRX
item.description: score:157 Chances: The recent publication of preclinical data in the online issue of Science, First Release is a positive indication of the potential of ImmunityBio’s combination therapy with N-803 and broadly neutralizing antibodies for managing HIV without the need for antiretroviral treatment. Risks: The company’s therapies are still in clinical stage, indicating that there is a risk of failure or delays in development.
